clients.description: Client that - in its default configuration - is **not** compliant to the FAPI 1.0 Baseline profile. However, after completing Task-3 this client should be compliant to the FAPI 1.0 Baseline profile.
Client that is not compliant to the FAPI 1.0 Baseline profile.

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

clientScopes.name: open-banking
clientScopes.description: Allows access to openBanking APIs accessing financial data. Only client that are compliant to the FAPI 1.0 Baseline profile are allowed to use this scope.

attributes.consent.screen.text: Allows access to openBanking APIs accessing financial data. Only client that are compliant to the FAPI 1.0 Baseline profile are allowed to use this scope.

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

clientScopes.name: acr
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add acr (authentication context class reference) to the token
